title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username/email and password with JWT session creation.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit login request
Check that login is successful and JWT token is returned
Verify token contains correct RBAC roles and permissions

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure and appropriate error messaging when incorrect username/email or password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email or wrong password
Submit login request
Check login is failed
Verify error message indicates incorrect credentials

title: Google OAuth Login Flow
description: Verify user authentication using Google OAuth and proper retrieval of user consent and roles.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click 'Login with Google' button
Complete OAuth consent flow successfully
Verify user is logged in with valid JWT token and proper roles assigned
Check that GDPR consent is recorded for the user

title: Booking Facility Successfully with Valid Membership
description: Ensure a member can book a facility slot when available, membership is valid, and payment is made successfully.

steps.description: Login as a valid member with active membership
Select a facility and desired date/time slot
System checks availability using real-time Redis locking
Proceed to payment via integrated payment gateway
Complete payment successfully
Verify that booking is confirmed and saved
Check that user receives booking confirmation notification via email and SMS

title: Prevent Double Booking of Facility Slot
description: Ensure the system rejects booking attempts for a facility slot already booked by another user via Redis lock conflict detection.

steps.description: User A books a facility slot successfully
User B attempts to book the same facility slot concurrently
Verify booking is rejected for User B due to slot unavailability
Verify that an appropriate error message or notification is shown to User B

title: Booking Rejected for Invalid Membership
description: Verify that facility booking is rejected if the userâ€™s membership is inactive or not valid for booking.

steps.description: Login as a user with an expired or inactive membership
Attempt to book a facility slot
Booking is rejected
User is notified to renew membership before booking

title: Membership Tier and Scholarship Pricing Influence
description: Verify that pricing during membership signup or renewal reflects the correct tier and scholarship discounts.

steps.description: Select membership signup with different tiers and applicable scholarships
System calculates the price dynamically
Validate the price matches expected value based on tier and scholarship
Ensure user can proceed with payment for the determined price

title: Championship Creation and Team Registration
description: Validate that admin can create championships, register teams, and set up tournament details correctly.

steps.description: Admin logs in with proper RBAC permissions
Create a new championship with all required details
Register teams into the championship
Verify championship and teams are created and associated correctly in system

title: Generate Fixtures and Update Match Results
description: Ensure championship fixtures are generated accurately and match results can be recorded and updated.

steps.description: Admin generates fixtures for a championship
Fixtures are created with correct match pairings and schedule
Admin records match results after matches played
Match results are saved and standings update accordingly in real-time

title: Team Attendance Tracking and Player Status Update
description: Verify that team attendance records can be logged and that player status updates based on medical certification and membership validity.

steps.description: Mark team attendance for a scheduled class or event
Attendance records are saved and retrievable
Upload and approve medical certificates for players
Player status updates automatically based on document status and membership validity

title: Medical Document Upload, Approval, and Expiry Tracking
description: Validate workflow for medical document submission by users, review and approval by staff, and expiry notifications.

steps.description: User uploads medical certificate document
Document is stored and status appears as 'Pending Approval'
Medical staff reviews and approves the document
Document status updates to 'Approved'
System tracks expiry dates and sends notifications prior to expiry
User and assigned staff receive email/SMS expiry alerts

title: Store Purchase and MercadoPago Payment Integration
description: Verify that a user can add products to the cart, validate cart contents, checkout via MercadoPago, and have order status updated accordingly.

steps.description: User browses product catalog and adds selected products to cart
Cart contents reflect selected products accurately
User proceeds to checkout
System validates cart before submitting order
User completes payment via MercadoPago gateway
Confirm payment is successful and order status is updated to 'Paid'
Order confirmation notification is sent to user

title: Cart Validation Rejects Invalid or Empty Cart
description: Ensure the system prevents checkout when the cart is empty or contains invalid products.

steps.description: Attempt checkout with empty cart
Checkout is denied with appropriate error message
Add invalid or discontinued product to cart and try checkout
Checkout is denied with error about invalid cart contents

title: GDPR Consent Management and Logging
description: Verify that user GDPR consent is requested, recorded with version, and can be reviewed or revoked.

steps.description: During registration or login, present GDPR consent form with version
User provides consent
Consent with version is logged to user profile
User reviews GDPR consent details
User revokes or withdraws consent
System updates consent status and applies necessary restrictions

title: Physical Access Control Validation
description: Verify that physical entry to club facilities is granted only when user has an active membership and valid access credentials (QR code / Pin).

steps.description: User attempts physical access with QR code or Pin
System checks active membership and subscription status
Access is granted only if conditions are met
Attempt access with expired or inactive membership
Access is denied

title: Notification Service Delivery for Email and SMS
description: Confirm notifications are sent and received correctly via both email and SMS channels for booking confirmations and alerts.

steps.description: Trigger a booking confirmation notification
User receives email notification with correct content
User receives SMS notification with correct summary

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that users with different roles can only perform allowed operations and access permitted data according to RBAC rules.

steps.description: Login as admin role
Verify admin can access all management modules (championships, bookings, users, etc.)
Login as member role
Verify member can access only their own bookings, membership, and limited profile information
Attempt unauthorized API call as member to admin resource
Verify access is denied with proper error message

title: Document Approval Workflow with Expiry Notifications
description: Ensure that documents uploaded for verification pass through approval workflows and users are notified before document expiry.

steps.description: Upload a verification document (e.g. ID, medical certificate)
Status shown as 'Pending Approval'
Approver reviews and marks document as approved
Document status updates to 'Approved'
System tracks document expiry dates
Notification sent to user and approvers prior to expiry
